subject_terms_3: Indian National Army (Singapore) Indian National Army Monument Site periodicals
physical_appearance: This clipping is a page from the periodical 'The Orient Illustrated Weekly' published on 26 May 1946. This page includes four articles on the officers of the Indian National Army. The page includes seven black-and-white photographs across the page. The edges of the page are slightly torn, especially at the top. There are several small tears in the center of the page.
title_text: The Orient Heroes and Heroines of I. N. A.
subject_terms_1: nationalism Indian (South Asian) armies soldiers periodicals
